text:
The Central government was making efforts to rescue fishermen under captivity in Saudhi Arabia and Kuwait for a long time, Union Minister of State for Road Transport, Highways and Shipping Pon. Radhakrishnan has said.

In a statement issued here on Wednesday, he said that the process of releasing 23 fishermen from Saudhi Arabia and 11 from Kuwait through diplomatic channels was under way by the Ministry of External Affairs.
title: “Centre making efforts to rescue fishermen”
